Observed at: North East Margaree 1:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 3 April 2023
